name: ShowcaseCinemas
0:
”Alexa, open Showcase Cinemas”
”Alexa, ask Showcase Cinemas showtimes for Top Gun Maverick”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: showcase cinemas
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Showcase Cinemas skill for Amazon Alexa is now the easiest way to find showtimes in your favorite Showcase location, hands-free.
Hear which movies are playing at a Showcase near you and find showtimes in your favorite format in a few simple steps.

Showcase Cinemas now makes going to the movies even easier - just ask Alexa!
